metadata.name: Azure SQL Server Firewall Rule
metadata.description: This module deploys an Azure SQL Server Firewall Rule.
Required. The name of the Server Firewall Rule.
Optional. The end IP address of the firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format. Must be greater than or equal to startIpAddress. Use value '0.0.0.0' for all Azure-internal IP addresses.
Optional. The start IP address of the firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format. Use value '0.0.0.0' for all Azure-internal IP addresses.
Conditional. The name of the parent SQL Server. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
The name of the deployed firewall rule.
The resource ID of the deployed firewall rule.
The resource group of the deployed firewall rule.
